channel.title: Speed Demos Archive Charity Speedruns Stream
channel.description:
http://speeddemosarchive.com/
Lots of fun speedrun games coming up, including Super Meat Boy, Super Mario Bros 1-3, Ghosts and Goblins and Castlevania.
Tune in and enjoy killing a few hours
